name: Lights out, Tapes in
description:
Lights out, Tapes in is supposed to be a mini scary game where you find yourself inside of a old house in a rainstorm. When you get in, you start to hear stuff. You then go and figure out what is making the noise.

This turned out to not be much horror, but i had a limited timescale and not much experience making horror games. Still hope you enjoy.

This game is for a game jam. As you can see, its not the highest quality. I made this game while I had covid.

-Coco

PS: Srry Text is gitched. Really small. Dont know how to fix. I know its a problem on mac. May be problem on windows. 

PSS: Dont even know if this will work. Never done it before.
